system.versionLabel: <Please input your application version label, e.g. Beta>
system.gitWorkTree: <Please input your git working directory, e.g. /INSTALL_PATH>
system.gitBranch: <Please input your git branch name this app is targetting, e.g. develop>
system.yii1Path: <Please input your Yii1 framework directory, e.g. /user/demo/yii-1.1.17.467ff50>
system.yii2Path: <Please input your Yii2 framework directory, e.g. /user/demo/yii-2.0.6>

domain.host: <Please input the host domain, e.g. bot.shopbay.org>
domain.api: <Please input the api server domain, e.g. api.shopbay.org>
domain.shop: <Please input the shop server domain, e.g. www.shopbay.org>

database.dbhost: <Please input the database hostname, e.g. localhost>

elasticsearch.host: <Please input the elasticsearch hostname, e.g. localhost>
